== Get your browser ready ==

To develop extensions for Google Chrome, you need to get on an early access release channel of Google Chrome. The normal, "Stable channel" release of Google Chrome doesn't yet support extensions (but we're working hard on that!).

    * *Windows* or *Linux*: Subscribe to the [http://www.google.com/landing/chrome/beta/ Beta channel]
    * *Mac*: Subscribe to the [http://www.chromium.org/getting-involved/dev-channel#TOC-Mac Dev channel]
